data.summary: Subnautica is a gorgeous survival game, but can it hold up on the Steam Deck?
data.game_display_settings:
- **General:**
- **Resolution:** 1152x720
- **Full Screen:** Off
- **Vsync:** Off
- **Graphics:**
- **Color Grading:** Filmic
- **Water Quality:** High
- **Anti-Aliasing:** FXAA
- **Anti-Aliasing Quality:** Off
- **Bloom:** On
- **Lens Dirt:** Off
- **Motion Blur Quality:** Low
- **Ambient Occlusion:** Medium
- **Screen Space Reflections:** Off
- **Dithering:** On
data.additional_notes:
#### SDHQ's Build Score Breakdown


Subnautica is a gorgeous game and even with some stuttering and FPS drops, is still really wonderful to see on Deck so far.
- **Performance:** ★★★☆☆ (3/5)
- **Visuals:** ★★★★☆ (4/5)
- **Stability:** ★★★☆☆ (3/5)
- **Controls:** ★★★☆☆ (3/5)
- **Battery:** ★★★★☆ (4/5)
